function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Long timeline for commercial release of vaccines","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential failure of vaccine efficacy in later clinical trials","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Cytokine bursts caused by vaccine leading to acute respiratory distress syndrome ards","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of unapproved drugs for covid-19 treatment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of conclusive evidence for the effectiveness of shl oral liquid against covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of preventive measures recommended by who and cdc","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with hand hygiene, social distancing, and other preventative measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to disinfect frequently touched surfaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate use and disposal of masks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on iot tools for disease monitoring may lead to false alarms or missed cases","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid surge in traffic on iomt tech and telemedicine platforms due to covid-19 outbreak","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of telemedicine platforms for screening covid-19","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Minimal human contact treatment using telemedicine strategies","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of telemedicine with other technologies","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of drone technology for crowd surveillance leading to privacy concerns and potential civil rights violations.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Minimized human interaction during the use of drones may lead to reduced community engagement and trust.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate cybersecurity measures for drone technology could lead to data breaches and misuse of surveillance data.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of drones for surveillance and crowd monitoring","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of drones for mass temperature screening","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential invasion of privacy due to constant surveillance by pandemic drones","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid delivery of medicines and supplies using drones","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of drones for crowd surveillance and disinfection","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of clear government regulatory policies for integrating uavs in the covid-19 impact response system","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through the use of drones for delivery","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on drone technology may lead to a reduction in human-to-human interactions, impacting social interactions and community cohesion","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Vulnerabilities in drone operations, such as gps jamming and hacking, make drones an attractive prospect for malicious users to conduct cyberterrorism and other unlawful activities.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Beyond visible line of sight bvlos drone operations remain somewhat unsafe, requiring technological and operational guidelines for safe operations.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uavs face constraints in terms of battery life and load capacity, inhibiting their capability to cover long distances and make multiple deliveries at once.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on robot technology may lead to reduced human oversight and care.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"High demand for autonomous disinfection robots could lead to shortages and delays in deployment.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to contaminated surfaces in hospitals and healthcare settings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential exposure to infected individuals during sample collection and patient support","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of virus transmission through traditional delivery mechanisms","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wearable devices may lead to false alarms or misdiagnosis of covid-19 symptoms, leading to unnecessary panic or burden on healthcare systems.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Wearable devices collecting and transmitting health data may pose privacy and security risks, potentially leading to unauthorized access or misuse of sensitive personal information.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on wearables for health monitoring may lead to neglect of traditional healthcare practices and face-to-face medical consultations, resulting in delayed or inadequate medical care for non-covid-19 related conditions.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Wearable may not accurately measure respiratory rates, leading to false notifications and undermining user trust.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data collection from wearable devices may raise privacy concerns and lead to misuse of personal health information.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The use of workplace contact tracing wearables may create a sense of surveillance and distrust among employees.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Wearable devices may not accurately capture and report the wearer’s health status, leading to unreliable data.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on smartphone applications for real-time health data could lead to privacy and security risks.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper disposal of the biosensor patches may lead to potential disease spread.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on a single device for remote health monitoring","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate data validation leading to false alarms or missed critical symptoms","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overreliance on technology for diagnosis and assessment","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential interruption of supply chains and delivery of wearables due to lockdowns and disruptions","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of established guidelines for the use of private data accumulated by wearables","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of integration of verified data sources in blockchain apps","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sharing verified health and location information among individuals, authorities, and hospitals","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of gis data for covid-19 mapping","category":"Political
